mapper.select: select p.uname, p.pfname, p.pfthumb, p.pfread, u.uphoto, (select count(*) from recommend rc where p.pfnum=rc.pfnum) as joa, (select count(*) from reply r where p.pfnum=r.pfnum) as replyNum from portfolio p, userList u where p.uname=u.uname order by joa desc
select tagname from portfolio where tagname like #{keyword}

select p.uname, p.pfname, p.pfthumb, p.pfread, u.uphoto, (select count(*) from recommend rc where p.pfnum=rc.pfnum) as joa, (select count(*) from reply r where p.pfnum=r.pfnum) as replyNum from portfolio p, userList u where p.uname=u.uname and tagname like #{keyword} order by joa desc
select uphoto from userList where uname=#{uname}

select p.uname, p.pfname, p.pfthumb, p.pfread, u.uphoto, (select count(*) from recommend rc where p.pfnum=rc.pfnum) as joa, (select count(*) from reply r where p.pfnum=r.pfnum) as replyNum from portfolio p, userList u where p.uname=u.uname and p.uname=#{uname} order by pfdate desc
